question: A plumber works for 3 weeks every month and for 4 days every week. If he gets paid $180 every day, how much does he earn if he works for a year?
answer:
The plumber works for 4 days every week and works for 3 weeks every month so he works for 4 days/week * 3 weeks/month = <<4*3=12>>12 days/month
If he earns $180 every day he then earns $180/day * 12 days/month = $<<180*12=2160>>2160/month
A year is equal to 12 months so every year he earns $2160/month * 12 months/year = $<<2160*12=25,920>>25,920
#### 25,920
